00040   class SIMD_API SimpleAssertImpl {
00041   public:
00042     inline static void precondition(bool condition) {
00043       if (!condition)
00044         throw PreconditionViolation("Precondition Violated");
00045     }
00046   
00047     inline static void precondition(bool condition, 
00048                                     const std::string& what) {
00049       if (!condition)
00050         throw PreconditionViolation(what);
00051     }
00052 
00053     inline static void precondition(bool condition, 
00054                                     const std::string& what, 
00055                                     const std::string& where) {
00056       if (!condition)
00057         throw PreconditionViolation(what, where);
00058     }
00059   
00060     inline static void postcondition(bool condition) {
00061       if (!condition)
00062         throw PostconditionViolation("Postcondition Violated");
00063     }
00064 
00065     inline static void postcondition(bool condition, 
00066                                      const std::string& what) {
00067       if (!condition)
00068         throw PostconditionViolation(what);
00069     }
00070 
00071     inline static void postcondition(bool condition, 
00072                                      const std::string& what, 
00073                                      const std::string& where) {
00074       if (!condition)
00075         throw PostconditionViolation(what, where);
00076     }
00077   
00078 
00079     inline static void invariant(bool condition) {
00080       if (!condition)
00081         throw StateInvariantViolation("State Invariant Violated");
00082     }
00083 
00084     inline static void invariant(bool condition, 
00085                                  const std::string& what) {
00086       if (!condition)
00087         throw StateInvariantViolation(what);
00088     }
00089   
00090     inline static void invariant(bool condition, 
00091                                  const std::string& what, 
00092                                  const std::string& where) {
00093       if (!condition)
00094         throw StateInvariantViolation(what, where);
00095 
00096     }
00097   };
00098 }
